mapper.insert:
insert into view_format_origin_record
id,
enterprise,
area,
record_time,
document,
operator,
operator_ip,
operator_time,
total,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{enterprise,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{area,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{document,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{total,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM (select a.*,b.enterprise_name as enterprise_name FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name FROM view_format_origin_record as a LEFT JOIN sys_area as b on a.area=b.id) as a LEFT JOIN supervision_enterprise as b on a.enterprise = b.id)as a WHERE 1=1
AND a.enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterprise},'%') AND a.record_time >= #{search.start} AND a.record_time <= #{search.end}
